00026 enum oprtr
00027 {
00028     /* Three operands - Case 1 */
00029     ADD ,
00030     MUL ,
00031     DIV ,
00032     SUB ,
00033 
00034     /* Two Operand - with result - Case 2 */
00035     UMINUS ,
00036     ADDR_OF,
00037     ASSIGN ,
00038 
00039     /* Two Operand - No result - Case 1 , with result undefined */
00040     LT ,
00041     GT ,
00042     LE ,
00043     GE ,
00044     EQ ,
00045     NE ,
00046 
00047          /* Three Operands - but cannot do cse */
00048          L_INDEX_ASSIGN,
00049          R_INDEX_ASSIGN,
00050 
00051          /* One operand  - with no result - Case 2 */
00052          PROC_BEGIN,
00053          PROC_END,
00054          RETURN,
00055          RETRIEVE,
00056          PARAM,
00057          CALL,
00058          LBL,
00059     GOTO ,
00060          
00061 
00062          /* Unknown Operator */
00063          UNKNOWN_OP=-1
00064 
00065 
00066 };
